authors.name: Duplication prohibited without permission from Investigative Reporters and Editors, Inc.

title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + TEN THINGS TO LOOK FOR NEXT MONTH
description: A list of ten items to look for in upcoming midyear campaign finance filings and midyear lobbying filings, including largest contributors, political action committee money, opponents' fundraising, spending, PAC donations, new registrations, and issues in the news.
